price: 97. Ils dirent : « Père ! Implore pour nous le pardon de nos péchés, car nous étions coupables. »
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَا ٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا خَٰطِـِٔينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāabānā is'taghfir lanā dhunūbanā innā kunnā khāṭiīna
